projects.name: HateMatch - Dating Platform Web Application
projects.description: Dating platform web application that matches users based on shared dislikes and opposing preferences.
highlights: Designed and developed the entire frontend using Vue and Vuetify, including user authentication, profile management, and simple interactive matching interface.
Engineered custom Vuetify theme and a context sensitive floating cursor for fun profile navigation, elevating UX.
Integrated Java Spring backend for secure user authentication and data management.
Prototyped matching algorithm using pairwise user preference negation, enabling MVP-level functionality with future optimization in mind.

projects.name: Custom Blog Platform
projects.description: Fully responsive static blog platform with a custom Hugo theme and layouts.
highlights: Built a UI framework with custom snippets for grid-based elements, dropdown reveals, animated thumbnails (WebM), embedded Three.js, and filtering using tags and categories.
Integrated Helvetica Now Variable Font, providing dynamic typography control and enhanced readability across devices.
Developed parallax scrolling effects with tag-based filtering systems, creating a visually engaging browsing experience.
Ensured subtle animations for most interactive elements, making all user interactions feel polished but doesn't get in the way of the content.

projects.name: ATK Generator
projects.description: Desktop application that renders a photorealistic ATK test result with handwritten timestamps.
highlights: Developed a desktop app enabling users to input metadata and generate photorealistic ATK test images with handwritten timestamps with preset environments.
Modeled and surfaced high-poly 3D ATK asset. Using blender, substance painter and designer.
Engineered a Python backend with Blender CLI to automate input textures and render jobs based on user-defined parameters.

projects.name: Separable Convolution Circular Lens Blur
projects.description: Post-processing Bokeh blur effect using separable convolution in imaginary phasor space.
highlights: Implemented an post-processing Bokeh blur algorithms that has O(n) runtime from the typical O(n^2) using separable convolution in imaginary phasor space.
Protoyped algorithm in MATLAB using CUDA then ported to Unity HDRP using ShaderLab HLSL, enabling real-time cinematic lens effects.

projects.name: Interactive Pathfinding Algorithm Visualizer
projects.description: Real-time algorithm visualizer supporting multiple search algorithms with interactive UI.
highlights: Built a real-time algorithm visualizer supporting multiple search algorithms with modular architecture.
Developed an event-driven UI system with dynamic updates and heuristic cost overlays.
Integrated real-time performance metrics and intuitive grid editor for scenario customization.

projects.name: Faithful Plant Placement
projects.technologies: VEX, OpenCL, C++, Python, HLSL, Houdini Engine, UE5
projects.description: Procedural simulation tools for vegetation placement in Unreal Engine 5 based on environmental data.
highlights: Developed procedural simulation tools for vegetation placement using climate, topology, and species data.
Implemented adaptive placement algorithms and seeding logic using iterative optimization.
Rendered photorealistic snapshots supporting simulation accuracy and art direction.

projects.name: Passive Matrix LCD Shader
projects.description: Custom material model simulating optical effects of monochrome passive matrix LCDs.
highlights: Simulated optical effects like parallax shadows, shimmer, and backlight bleed.
Engineered a procedural pixel matrix using GLSL for authentic LCD rendering.
Optimized shader performance for real-time applications.

projects.name: GPU-Based Monte Carlo Global Illumination & Irradiance Field Probes
projects.technologies: C++, GLSL, Compute Shaders, Dear IMGUI
projects.description: Global illumination system using Monte Carlo methods and irradiance probes for real-time lighting.
highlights: Developed a high-performance GI system with Monte Carlo methods for accurate light transport simulation.
Implemented GPU-based compute shaders for accelerating real-time GI using ray marching in SDF.
Designed irradiance probe system optimizing indirect lighting in dynamic scenes.
Benchmarked GI approaches demonstrating 8x speed improvements.

projects.name: Hello Mascot
projects.description: Real-time mascot experience demo with full-body interactions via pose tracking.
highlights: Enabled full-body interactions using Google MediaPipe pose tracking.
Designed GPU shaders for stylized visuals and procedural facial animation.
Modeled and animated high-fidelity characters for live installations.
Delivered a successful proof-of-concept for internal commercialization.

projects.name: Seamless City - Bangkok Design Week 2024
projects.description: 3-player 3D installation showcased at Bangkok Design Week 2024.
highlights: Implemented advanced graphics: multifocal vignetting, cloth dynamics, SDF-based collisions, and interactive bloom/glare.
Extended Intel RealSense C# API for onsite depth camera calibration.
Praised by 200+ attendees for seamless multiplayer interaction.

projects.name: Mini Sky Engine
projects.technologies: OpenGL, C#, GLSL, OpenTK, Dear IMGUI
projects.description: Real-time sky rendering engine simulating atmospheric effects.
highlights: Simulated atmospheric effects with sunlight, sky scattering, and volumetric clouds using GPU LUTs.
Raymarched dynamic volumetric clouds using FBM noise fields.
Built engine architecture in C# with shader management and IMGUI tools.

projects.name: Brackey's Game Jam 2024.2 - Lights Out
projects.description: Stylized 2D game made for Brackey's Game Jam (Theme: 'Calm Before the Storm').
highlights: Developed palette remapping and film grain shaders for tense visual aesthetic.
Implemented GPU-accelerated VFX and 2D light system.
Programmed gameplay systems: torch combat, sanity, audio, and transitions.
Designed and produced all game audio for immersive experience.

projects.name: Shell + Terminal Animation Library
projects.description: Simplified Linux shell with command parsing and animated terminal UX.
highlights: Implemented command parsing, job control, and I/O redirection using fork/exec/wait.
Designed a bash-like UX with command history and true-color formatting.
Added splash screen animations using flip-book rendering.

projects.name: Web Server
projects.description: Multi-threaded web server supporting HTTP/1.1 and CGI.
highlights: Implemented HTTP/1.1 protocol with request parsing, response generation, and CGI-based POST handling.
Used YACC for structured input and multithreading for concurrent connections.

projects.name: Single Cycle MIPS Simulator
projects.description: Instruction-level simulator for MIPS architecture with execution tracing.
highlights: Implemented instruction emulation for arithmetic, branching, memory, and syscall operations.
Integrated endian-aware memory and debugging features.

projects.name: Streaming Data Pipeline & Exploratory Data Analysis
projects.description: Real-time data pipeline integrating financial and event streams with analytics.
highlights: Ingested data from Yahoo Finance and GDELT using Kafka.
Optimized storage using Snappy-compressed Parquet and SQL analytics via DuckDB.
Performed time-series analysis and hypothesis testing to uncover market-news relationships.

projects.name: Streaming Data Pipeline & Real-Time Visualization
projects.description: Real-time data visualization of financial trends using Elasticsearch and Kibana.
highlights: Built streaming data ingestion from Alpaca and Free Currency API using Kafka.
Engineered Elasticsearch queries for search and aggregation.
Designed interactive dashboards in Kibana and performed ETL/data transformation.

projects.name: E-Sports Minecraft Modding and Server DevOps
projects.technologies: Java, Docker, HTML, JS, FFmpeg (WebM), Python, Unix
projects.description: Managed E-Sports competition logistics, developed mods, and deployed game servers for Animation Games Club Minecraft competitions: UHC, Survival Games and Sky Wars.
highlights: Managed end-to-end competition logistics, including scheduling and participant coordination.
Deployed dockerized game servers for matches, ensuring repoducibility and stability.
Programmed custom mods by forking plugins to enforce competition rules and enhance gameplay.
Built static websites and assets for onboarding and competition information using GitHub Pages.
Created a registration dashboard using Python and Google Workspace API for seamless participant management.

projects.name: JSON-Based Resume Generator
projects.technologies: Flask, Jinja2, Tailwind CSS, PostCSS, JavaScript, SSE
projects.description: Batch resume generator that creates tailored resumes for different job positions, ordering content by relevance map.
highlights: Engineered a Flask and Jinja2 web application that generates position-specific resumes from JSON data sources.
Implemented server-sent events (SSE) via subprocesses to provide real-time updates during resume generation.
Developed a filesystem watching system that automatically rebuilds resumes when source content changes.
Created an index interface to browse all generated resumes for each position.
Designed a theme modern take on Harvard style resume using Tailwind CSS with PostCSS processing.
